title: Writing Competition?
body:
I've seen the art and cosplay competitions recently and love the effort put in by everyone. The results were amazing!

I was wondering if there could ever be a creative writing event, as a person passionate about it!

Thank you!

replies.body:
I'm a muso (I have 6 guitars (including 12 string, dobro, shred style electrics, etc), bass, mandolin, tenor banjo, accordion, zither, harmonica, xun (a Chinese ocarina), etc).
When will there be something I can contribute to?

I even wrote a metal piece called "The Howling Abyss", I just need to record it.

Hey Aquariuus! So we've actually run a couple of writing contests in the past - you can see a collection of entries (and just general awesome work by the community in the Fanfiction board. :D We're hoping to run another writing contest for OCE in the near future - so watch this space.
